<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a new Pix Infraction Report"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/pix/infraction-report"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates an infraction report.

When the purpose of the infraction report is to request a refund,
The PSP of the payer of the original transaction must create the notification.
To cancel a refund, the PSP of the recipient of the original transaction must be created.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixInfractionReportRequest","description":"","required":["transactionId","reason","situationType"],"type":"object","properties":{"reportDetails":{"description":"Details that can help the receiving participant to analyze the suspected violation.","maxLength":2000,"type":"string","readOnly":false},"transactionId":{"description":"Identifier of the transaction settled in the SPI.","pattern":"\\w{8,32}","type":"string"},"reason":{"description":"Reason for opening an infraction report.","enum":["REFUND_REQUEST","REFUND_CANCELLED"],"type":"string"},"situationType":{"description":"Type of situation that gave rise to the infraction notification.","enum":["SCAM","ACCOUNT_TAKEOVER","COERCION","FRAUDULENT_ACCESS","OTHER","UNKNOWN"],"type":"string"},"contactInformation":{"description":"","type":"object","properties":{"email":{"description":"Contact email.","pattern":"^[a-z0-9.!#$%&'*+\\/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]{0,61}[a-z0-9])?(?:\\.[a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]{0,61}[a-z0-9])?)*$","type":"string"},"phone":{"description":"Phone number contact.","pattern":"^\\+[0-9]\\d{1,14}$","type":"string"}},"title":"ContactInformation"}},"example":{"transactionId":"E9999901012341234123412345678900","infractionType":"FRAUD","reportDetails":"Details that can help the receiving participant to analyze the suspected violation."}},"examples":{"PixInfractionReportRequest":{"value":{"reportDetails":"Transaction made through fake QR Code on billet","transactionId":"E9999901012341234123412345678900","reason":"REFUND_REQUEST","situationType":"SCAM","contactInformation":{"email":"emaildecontato@test.com","phone":"+5512345678901"}}}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
